name: Kawaii Puzzle: Girl Adventure 🌸💖
description:
Kawaii Puzzle: Girl Adventure 🌸💖! It's a blend of puzzle-solving with soothing music and delightful girls.

🧩 Puzzles: You'll tackle puzzles of varying difficulty to progress and unlock new levels.

👧 Anime Girls: Meet a plethora of colorful anime girls. Collect the entire cast of characters.
🗺 Adventure Map: Unlock new levels using earned rewards.


Plus, you'll find:
🌸 Colorful design
🌟 Relaxing music
💭 Dialogues and jokes
🤎 Over 50 diverse artworks
📨 Updates bringing new content.
